summary: Both timestamp format mismatches were corrected to use sqliteTimestamp consistently, with no new blocking issues introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Proposal expiry stored in ISO 8601 format causing incorrect lexicographic comparisons against sqliteTimestamp()
previous_issues_status.notes: expiresAt now uses sqliteTimestamp(new Date(...)) ensuring consistent format for comparisons.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Reputation window cutoff stored in ISO 8601 format causing incorrect lexicographic comparisons against sqliteTimestamp()
previous_issues_status.notes: cutoff now uses sqliteTimestamp(new Date(...)) matching stored SQLite datetime format.
